ai-tha-ap350:2.2_0: “In the wilderness, I’m sitting in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap350:2.3_0: When they saw him, the god
ai-tha-ap350:3.3_0: I sat on the seat spread out the Buddha’s instructions.
ai-tha-ap350:4.1_0: Having given to the gods, the Lord of the Gods,
ai-tha-ap350:4.2_0: converted my mind to confidence in him.
ai-tha-ap350:5.1_0: for a long time, asking me,
ai-tha-ap350:5.4_0: with the passing away I have died there,
ai-tha-ap350:6.3_0: You’re freed from champions and foes.
ai-tha-ap350:6.4_0: I went to the realm of the gods,
ai-tha-ap350:7.3_0: It had a thousand panels, a thousand panels,
ai-tha-ap350:7.4_0: all adorned with banners, and made of gold.
ai-tha-ap350:8.2_0: Having more than a hundred years old,
ai-tha-ap350:8.3_0: was crowded by gods and humans stuck in a god.
ai-tha-ap350:9.1_0: After passing away from the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap350:9.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap350:9.3_0: having come to a human state,
ai-tha-ap350:9.4_0: they’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap350:10.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap350:10.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap350:10.4_0: this fruit is made from a plantain,
ai-tha-ap350:12.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Protector.
